p: From October 21 to 25, 2020, we extracted English language tweets using the keyword “IDWeek 2020” leveraging Twitter’s Application Programming Interface (API) via RStudio (version 1.3.1093). We collected 89 variables associated with each tweet, of which 10 are used in this analysis. Using a previously described method for tweet analysis, we processed and transformed the data into a usable format and explored basic characteristics [4].
